mapper.select: SELECT m.nickname AS "nickname", ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM friend f WHERE (f.sender_id = #{memberId} OR f.receiver_id = #{memberId}) AND f.is_accept = true ) AS "friendCnt", m.point AS "point", (SELECT filename FROM profile_img WHERE member_id = #{memberId}) AS "profileImage" FROM member m WHERE m.id = #{memberId}
SELECT mz.name AS "matzipName", mz.img_url AS "matzipImage" FROM wish_list w JOIN matzip mz ON w.matzip_id = mz.id WHERE w.member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT mz.name AS "matzipName", mz.img_url AS "matzipImage" FROM my_matzip mm JOIN matzip mz ON mm.matzip_id = mz.id WHERE mm.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT mz.name AS "matzipName", mz.img_url AS "matzipImage", mr.content AS "reviewContent", mr.star_rating AS "starRating" FROM my_review mr JOIN matzip mz ON mr.matzip_id = mz.id WHERE mr.member_id = #{memberId}
